channel.title: Running my server
channel.description: Hey, I know there is a way to run your server without hosting, but I can't seem to do it. I can run or compile, and I don't know how I should edit classpaths and such. How do I get my server to run w/o hosting?

item.title: Running my server
item.dc:creator: @Pieface5566 Pieface5566
item.description:
@Pieface5566 wrote:

To make a server show, you need to host it? I think not, but eh… maybe you do… You need to host the server so other people can access it to see it yourself? How would I do that?

Read full topic

item.title: Running my server
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Pieface5566:

Hey, I know there is a way to run your server without hosting, but I can’t seem to do it. I can run or compile, and I don’t know how I should edit classpaths and such. How do I get my server to run w/o hosting?

Running a server requires hosting, unless you buy a VPS.

Read full topic
